metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8379 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
CakePHP 2.x and 3.x before 3.1.5 might allow remote attackers to bypass the CSRF protection mechanism via the _method parameter.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8379` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

cakephp - 2.8.0-1
cakephp-scripts - 2.8.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cakephp package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.8.0-1').
